title: ICE: Intrinsics cannot be used as bare functions

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
``` rust
use std::mem;
fn main() {
    let foo: unsafe extern "rust-intrinsic" fn(int) -> uint = mem::transmute;
}
```

```
error: internal compiler error: type_of_fn_from_ty given intrinsic
note: the compiler hit an unexpected failure path. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
```
